title: Perelman and Scientific Games Sued by Hedge-Fund Firm Sylebra
text:
A Hong Kong hedge-fund firm has sued billionaire financier Ronald Perelman and the gaming company he chairs, alleging they raised concerns about the firm to regulators in a bid to force it to sell back its stake in the gambling company at a steep discount.

Sylebra Capital Partners, based on Hong Kong, began buying shares of Scientific Games Corp. in 2015 and by April 2017 had accumulated a 9.8% stake in the company, which sells gambling machines and instant-lottery games. According to the suit, filed Wednesday in Delaware...
